DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary. Biologically active substance, including those intended for use in diagnosis, treatment, or prevention of disease or other abnormalities, for the relif of suffering, or control or improvement of a physical or mental state; includes biological products. Occurring in or belonging to the present time. A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: biologically active substance, including those intended for use in diagnosis, treatment, or prevention of disease or other abnormalities, for the relief of suffering, or control or improvement of a physical or mental state; includes biological products.:Occurring in or belonging to the present time.

Concepts.definition: A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.
Occurring in or belonging to the present time.
